mapper.select: select m.content, m.id, t.name as send_from, t.id as send_from_id, s.name as send_to, s.id as send_to_id, m.status, count(m.content) as total from message as m left join student as s on m.reci_id = s.id left join teacher as t on m.deli_id = t.id where s.id = #{sid}

select m.content, m.id, s.name as send_from, s.id as send_from_id, t.id as send_to_id, t.name as send_to, m.status, count(m.content) as total from message as m left join student as s on m.deli_id = s.id left join teacher as t on m.reci_id = t.id where t.id = #{tid}

select m.content, m.id, 'System' as send_from, 'System' as send_from_id, t.name as send_to, t.id as send_to_id, m.status, count(m.content) as total from message as m left join teacher as t on m.reci_id = t.id where t.id = #{tid} and m.deli_id = 'System'
